post.title: Back from the Basement
post.content: Back from vacation, caught up on email and weblogs, and ready to code. Scott sent me some of his weblog code to look at on the plane to Phoenix. How is it that I always seem to work on my blog in Phoenix? Looking forward to also checking out BlogX 1.1 or BlogY or whatever they call it. Also have a few updates to the SharePoint RSS feed generator to implement. There’s been interest inside Microsoft, but I haven’t heard much interest on the outside.
